Class LevelManager

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.controller.LevelManager
public class LevelManager extends Object
Coordinates level-based gameplay, tracking the active level, block and score requirements, and integrating with LevelProgressManager to honor which levels are unlocked.

  • Property Summary

    Properties
    Type
    Property
    Description
    javafx.beans.property.IntegerProperty
    blocksPlaced
    Exposes the blocks-placed counter as a bindable JavaFX property.

    Exposes the blocks-required target as a bindable JavaFX property.

    Exposes the current level as a bindable JavaFX property.
    javafx.beans.property.IntegerProperty
    scoreRequired
    Exposes the score-required target as a bindable JavaFX property.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    LevelManager()
    Creates a level manager starting from level 1 using the default level configuration set.
    LevelManager(int levelId)
    Creates a level manager starting from a specific level using the default level configuration set.

  • Constructor Details

    • LevelManager

      public LevelManager()
      Creates a level manager starting from level 1 using the default level configuration set.

    • LevelManager

      public LevelManager(int levelId)
      Creates a level manager starting from a specific level using the default level configuration set.
      Parameters:
      levelId - initial level to load

  • Method Details

    • setLevel

      public void setLevel(int levelId)
      Selects the current level configuration if the given identifier is within bounds and the level is not locked.
      Parameters:
      levelId - level to make active

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Resets per-level counters such as blocks placed and recomputes the current level requirements.

    • incrementBlocksPlaced

      public void incrementBlocksPlaced()
      Increments the count of blocks placed in the current level.

    • checkLevelComplete

      public boolean checkLevelComplete(int currentScore)
      Determines whether the level is complete based on blocks placed and the player's current score.
      Parameters:
      currentScore - the player's current score
      Returns:
      true if all requirements are met, false otherwise

    • checkLevelFailed

      public boolean checkLevelFailed(int currentScore)
      Determines whether the level has failed because the block quota has been reached without hitting the target score.
      Parameters:
      currentScore - the player's current score
      Returns:
      true if the level is failed, false otherwise

    • advanceLevel

      public boolean advanceLevel()
      Advances to the next level if one exists, resetting per-level counters.
      Returns:
      true if a higher level was activated, false if the current level is already the maximum

    • isMaxLevel

      public boolean isMaxLevel()
      Indicates whether the current level is the highest supported level.
      Returns:
      true if at the maximum level, false otherwise

    • getMaxLevel

      public int getMaxLevel()
      Returns the maximum level index configured for the game.
      Returns:
      the maximum level number

    • getCurrentLevelConfig

      public LevelConfig getCurrentLevelConfig()
      Returns the configuration object for the current level.
      Returns:
      active LevelConfig, or null if none is set

    • getAllLevels

      public LevelConfig[] getAllLevels()
      Returns the full array of level configurations.
      Returns:
      all configured levels

    • getDropSpeed

      public int getDropSpeed()
      Returns the drop speed in milliseconds for the current level, or a sensible default if no level is active.
      Returns:
      the drop speed for the current level

    • unlockNextLevel

      public void unlockNextLevel()
      Unlocks the next level in progression, if it exists, and updates lock states accordingly.

    • isLevelLocked

      public boolean isLevelLocked(int levelId)
      Indicates whether a level is currently locked.
      Parameters:
      levelId - level index to query
      Returns:
      true if the level is locked, false otherwise

    • getBlocksRemaining

      public int getBlocksRemaining()
      Returns how many blocks remain to be placed before the level's block requirement is satisfied.
      Returns:
      non-negative number of remaining blocks

    • getSpeedMultiplier

      public int getSpeedMultiplier()
      Returns a simple multiplier derived from the current level, useful for scaling difficulty-related parameters.
      Returns:
      the current level value as a multiplier (at least 1)

    • currentLevelProperty

      public javafx.beans.property.IntegerProperty currentLevelProperty()
      Exposes the current level as a bindable JavaFX property.
      Returns:
      property representing the current level
      See Also:
      • getCurrentLevel()

      Exposes the blocks-placed counter as a bindable JavaFX property.
      Returns:
      property tracking blocks placed this level
      See Also:
      • getBlocksPlaced()

    • getBlocksRequired

      public int getBlocksRequired()
      Returns the number of blocks that must be placed to satisfy the level's block requirement.
      Returns:
      total blocks required for this level

    • getScoreRequired

      public int getScoreRequired()
      Returns the score that must be achieved to complete the current level.
      Returns:
      target score for this level
